fields.title: Joriy yilning 14 yanvar kuni Urganch RANCH texnologiya universiteti Kengashi bo'lib o'tdi.
fields.title_uz: Joriy yilning 14 yanvar kuni Urganch RANCH texnologiya universiteti Kengashi bo'lib o'tdi.
fields.title_en: On January 14 of this year, the Urgench RANCH University of Technology Council was held.
fields.desc:
Unda O‘zbekiston Respublikasi Vazirlar Mahkamasi huzuridagi Ta'lim sifatini nazorat qilish davlat inspeksiyasi Xorazm viloyati bo‘limi boshlig‘i  J.Boltaev, Urganch davlat universiteti ta’lim sifatini nazorat qilish bo‘limi boshlig‘i K. Babadjonov hamda Muhammad al-Xorazmiy nomidagi Tashkent axborot texnologiyalari universiteti ta’lim sifatini nazorat qilish bo‘limi boshlig‘i O.Allamovlar ishtirok etdilar.

Kengash kun tartibidagi bir qator masalalar ko'rib chiqildi jumladan 2021-2022 o'quv yili mobaynida kamchilik va yutuqlar yuzasidan taftish komissiyasining hisoboti tinglandi. Taftish komissiyasi xulosasi hamda kengashda bildirilgan takliflar asosida kengash qarori qabul qilindi.
fields.desc_uz:
Unda O‘zbekiston Respublikasi Vazirlar Mahkamasi huzuridagi Ta'lim sifatini nazorat qilish davlat inspeksiyasi Xorazm viloyati bo‘limi boshlig‘i  J.Boltaev, Urganch davlat universiteti ta’lim sifatini nazorat qilish bo‘limi boshlig‘i K. Babadjonov hamda Muhammad al-Xorazmiy nomidagi Tashkent axborot texnologiyalari universiteti ta’lim sifatini nazorat qilish bo‘limi boshlig‘i O.Allamovlar ishtirok etdilar.

Kengash kun tartibidagi bir qator masalalar ko'rib chiqildi jumladan 2021-2022 o'quv yili mobaynida kamchilik va yutuqlar yuzasidan taftish komissiyasining hisoboti tinglandi. Taftish komissiyasi xulosasi hamda kengashda bildirilgan takliflar asosida kengash qarori qabul qilindi.
fields.desc_en:
In it, the head of the Department of Khorezm region of the state inspectorate for quality control of Education under the Cabinet of Ministers of the Republic of Uzbekistan J.Boltaev, head of Education Quality Control Department of Urgench State University K. Babadzhanov as well as the head of the Department of quality control of education of the Tashkent University of Information Technology named after Muhammad al-Khwarazmi O.Allamovs participated.

A number of issues on the agenda of the council were considered, including the Audit Commission's report on the shortcomings and achievements during the 2021-2022 academic year. The decision of the council was made on the basis of the conclusion of the Audit Commission and the proposals made in the council.

fields.title: 14 yanvar kuni Urganch RANCH texnologiya universitetida yil yakuniga bag'ishlangan yig'ilish bo'lib o'tdi.
fields.title_uz: 14 yanvar kuni Urganch RANCH texnologiya universitetida yil yakuniga bag'ishlangan yig'ilish bo'lib o'tdi.
fields.title_en: On January 14, a year-end rally was held at Urgench RANCH University of technology.
fields.desc:
Yig'ilishni universitet rektori v.v.b. D. Ruzmetov ochib berdi va amalga oshirilgan ishlar yuzasidan hisobot berdi hamda universitetning barcha  hodimlarining hisoboti tinglandi. Shundan so'ng ta'sischi J.Atadjanov majlis  ishtirokchilariga universitet faoliyatida o'tgan 2021-2022 o'quv yili mobaynida sitqidildan mehnat qilgan Sulaymon Sultonov va Mexri Nuratdinovalarga Turkiyaga 1 haftalik sayohat uchun yo'llanma sertifikatini topshirishdi. RANCH texnologiya universitetida fidokorona mehnat qilgan xodimlarini rag'batlantirish  doimiy amalga oshirilishini bildirdi. 

Universitetimiz jamoasi xodimlarimizning  maroqli hordiq chiqarishini tilab qoladi.
fields.desc_uz:
Yig'ilishni universitet rektori v.v.b. D. Ruzmetov ochib berdi va amalga oshirilgan ishlar yuzasidan hisobot berdi hamda universitetning barcha  hodimlarining hisoboti tinglandi. Shundan so'ng ta'sischi J.Atadjanov majlis  ishtirokchilariga universitet faoliyatida o'tgan 2021-2022 o'quv yili mobaynida sitqidildan mehnat qilgan Sulaymon Sultonov va Mexri Nuratdinovalarga Turkiyaga 1 haftalik sayohat uchun yo'llanma sertifikatini topshirishdi. RANCH texnologiya universitetida fidokorona mehnat qilgan xodimlarini rag'batlantirish  doimiy amalga oshirilishini bildirdi. 

Universitetimiz jamoasi xodimlarimizning  maroqli hordiq chiqarishini tilab qoladi.
fields.desc_en:
The meeting was attended by the rector of the University v.v.b. D. Ruzmetov revealed and reported on the work carried out, and the report of all employees of the university was heard. After that, the founder J.Atadzhanov handed the participants of the meeting a certificate of referral for a 1-week trip to Turkey to Suleyman Sultanov and Mekhri Nuratdinova, who worked from sitqidil during the 2021-2022 academic year in university activities. The ranch stated that the promotion of its selfless employees at the University of technology would be carried out continuously. 

The team of our university wishes for interesting recreation of our employees.

fields.title_en: On February 23 of this year, a spiritual and educational event on the topic ‚Äúawareness period student‚Äù was held at the Urgench Ranch University of technology with the participation of student youth.
fields.desc:
Tadbirda Xorazm viloyat DXX Boshqarmasi xodimi F.Abdulvoxiev, Xalq deputatlari  Urganch tuman kengashi kotibiyat mudiri,  targ‘ibot guruhi rahbari Z.Masharipova, Urganch tuman hokimligi diniy ishlar bo‘yicha qo‘mitasi bosh mutaxassisi A.Palvanovlar ishtirok qildilar. 

Ma’ruzachilar talaba yoshlarga diniy ekstremistik oqimlar, terroristik tashkilotlar, missonerlik va boshqa jinoiy faoliyatlar to‘g‘risida tushunchalar berib, ogohlikka chaqirdilar hamda ularni vatanparvar bo‘lishga chaqirdilar.

Ma’ruzachilar talaba yoshlarga diniy ekstremistik oqimlar, terroristik tashkilotlar, missonerlik va boshqa jinoiy faoliyatlar to‘g‘risida tushunchalar berib, ogohlikka chaqirdilar hamda ularni vatanparvar bo‘lishga chaqirdilar.
fields.desc_en:
At the event, an employee of the Khwarezm regional DXX Department F.Abdulvokhiev, head of the secretariat of the Urgench District Council of people's deputies, head of the propaganda group Z.Masharipova, Chief Specialist of the Committee on religious affairs of the Urgench District Municipality A.The palvanovs participated. 

The speakers called for alertness by giving student youth insights into religious extremist currents, terrorist organizations, missonism and other criminal activities, and urged them to become Patriots.

fields.title: TOSHKENT DAVLAT IQTISODIYOT UNIVERSITETI BILAN HAMKORLIK SHARTNOMASI TUZILDI.

fields.desc:
üè¢ Toshkent davlat iqtisodiyot universiteti va Urganch Ranch texnologiya universiteti o‘rtasida o‘zaro hamkorlik to'g'risida shartnoma imzolandi. Shartnomani Toshkent davlat iqtisodiyot universiteti rektori K.A.Sharipov va Urganch Ranch texnologiya universiteti rektori v.v.b. D.I.Ruzmetov imzoladilar.

Shartnomada:

üî∏ Universitetda o'qitiladigan ayrim fanlardan ma'ruza va amaliyot mashg'ulotlarini o'tkazishga, bitiruv malakaviy ishlari va magistrlik dissertatsiyasini tayyorlashda rahbarlik qilishga TDIU yetakchi olim va mutaxassislarini jalb etilishiga imkoniyatlar yaratish.

  1. üî∏ Tayanch doktorantura (PhD) va doktorantura (DSc) orqali UTU Ranch o'qituvchilaridan yuqori malakali ilmiy-pedagogik kadrlar tayyorlab berishda ko'maklashishga, talabalar almashinuviga va boshqa bir qator yo'nalishlarda hamkorlik qilish yuzasidan kelishib olindi.

fields.desc_en:
üè¢ Tashkent State University of Economics and Urgench Ranch University of Technology signed an agreement on cooperation. The contract was signed by the rector of Tashkent State University of Economics K.A.Rector of Sharipov and Urgench Ranch University of technology V.v.b. D.I.Ruzmetov signed.

In the contract:

üî∏ To provide opportunities for the involvement of leading scientists and specialists of the TDIU to conduct lecture and internship classes in certain subjects taught at the university, to lead in the preparation of Graduation qualification work and master's thesis.

üî∏ Through the base doctoral (PhD) and doctoral (DSc), it was agreed to assist in the training of highly qualified scientific and pedagogical personnel from UTU Ranch teachers, to cooperate in student exchange and a number of other areas.

üè¢ Shartnomani O'zbekiston davlat jahon tillari universiteti rektori v.v.b. B.G.Kulmatov va Urganch Ranch texnologiya universiteti rektori v.v.b. D.I.Ruzmetov imzoladilar. 

Shartnomada:
üî∏ O'zDJTU va UTU Ranch o'quv, ilmiy va innovatsion mavzular bo'yicha birgalikda o'quv metodik, ilmiy- pedagogik ishlarni amalga oshirish;

üî∏ O'qtuvchi-professorlar va talabalar tomonidan chet tillarini chuqur o’zlashtirishga zamin yaratish maqsadida O'zDJTU va UTU Ranch hamkorligida ilmiy, maxalliy va xalqaro anjumanlarni hamda talabalar festivalini tashkil qilish;

üî∏ UTU Ranch Universitetida o'qitiladigan ayrim fanlardan o'quv mashg'ulotlarini o'tkazilishi uchun O'zDJTU universiteti professor - o'qituvchilarini, jalb qilinishiga va talabalar almashinuvida hamkorlik qilishga kelishib olindi.

fields.desc_en:
üè¢ The treaty was signed by the rector of the Uzbek State University of world languages V.v.b. B.G.Rector of Kulmatov and Urgench Ranch University of technology V.v.b. D.I.Ruzmetov signed.

In the contract:
üî∏ Uzdjtu and UTU Ranch carry out joint educational methodological, scientific and pedagogical work on Educational, Scientific and innovative topics;

üî∏ Organization of scientific, educational and international conferences and student festival with the cooperation of Uzdjtu and UTU Ranch in order to create the ground for deep assimilation of foreign languages by students and professors;

üî∏ It was agreed that the University of Özdjtu will be engaged and cooperate in the exchange of students, so that training from certain subjects taught at UTU Ranch University can be carried out.

fields.title_en: üè¢ Workshop training for regional entrepreneurs was held at Urgench RANCH University of technology in partnership with the University of Northampton, England.
fields.desc:
Seminar treningni universitet ta'sischisi J.A.Atajonov universitetning ta'sis qilinishi va maqsadlari yuzasidan nutqi bilan ochib berdi. Shundan so'ng universitet rektori v.v.b. D.I.Ruzmetov universitetda xalqaro hamkorlik va munosabatlar yuzasidan amalga oshirilayotgan  ishlar va o'tkazilayotgan seminar trening maqsad va vazifalari yuzasidan axborot berdi. 

Seminar treningda ZOOM platformasi orqali Northampton universiteti tadbirkorlarni qo'llab-quvvatlash Chaingmaker Inkubatori direktori Jay Boughan  Angliyada tadbirkorlik muhiti va tadbirkorlar bilan hamkorlikda amalga oshirish mumkin bo'lgan loyihalar yuzasidan tadbirkorlarga prezentatsiyalarini taqdim qildilar. Dr. Adeboye o'zining ma'ruzasi bilan seminar treningni davom ettirdi.

Dr. Adeboye o'zining ma'ruzasi bilan seminar treningni davom ettirdi.
fields.desc_en:
Seminar training was conducted by the founder of the University J.A.Atajonov opened with a speech on the establishment and goals of the University. After that, the rector of the University v.v.b. D.I.Ruzmetov gave information on the goals and objectives of the training on the work carried out on international cooperation and relations at the University and the seminar being held. 

Through the ZOOM platform at the workshop, Jay Boughan, director of the University of Northampton entrepreneur support Chaingmaker incubator, presented presentations to entrepreneurs on the entrepreneurial environment in England and possible projects in collaboration with entrepreneurs. Dr. Adeboye continued seminar training with his lecture.

fields.desc:
Hisobotni Urganch RANCH texnologiya universiteti rektori v.v.b. D.I.Ruzmetov kirish so'zi bilan ochib berdi. Shundan so'ng universitet ta'sischisi J.A.Atajanov xalqaro hamkorlikni yanada rivojlanishiga tayyor ekanligini bildirdi. Yig'ilishni Angliyaning Northamton universiteti professori o'zining hafta davomida talabalar bilan o'tgan ma ºruzalarda va tadbirkorlar bilan uchrashuvlar davomida olgan taassurotlari bilan o'rtoqlashdi.

Yig'ilish kun tartibi asosida davom etmoqda.

The report was published by the rector of Urgench RANCH University of technology v.v.b. D.I.Ruzmetov revealed with an introduction. After that, the founder of the University J.A.Atajanov expressed his readiness to further develop international cooperation. The meeting was shared by a professor from the University of Northamton, England, with the impressions he received during his lectures with students during the week and during meetings with entrepreneurs.

The meeting continues on the basis of the agenda.

fields.desc:
Unda Angliyaning Northamton universiteti professori DADA Adeboyening Urganch RANCH texnologiya universiteti rivojiga va ikki tomonlama do‘stlik rishtalarini kuchaytirishda qo‘shgan hissasi uchun hamda bir qator taqsinga sazovor amalga oshirgan ishlarini inobatga olinib Uragnch RANCH texnologiya Universitetining faxriy professori unvoni berildi. 

Urganch RANCH tehnologiya Universiteti faxriy professori DADA Adeboye universitetda xalqaro andozalarga mos muhit yaratilganligini e ºtirof etib o‘tdi va hamkorlikda ishlashga, universitet nufuzini dunyoga tanitishda o‘z hissasini qo‘shishga doim tayyor ekanligini bildirdi.
fields.desc_uz:
Unda Angliyaning Northamton universiteti professori DADA Adeboyening Urganch RANCH texnologiya universiteti rivojiga va ikki tomonlama do‘stlik rishtalarini kuchaytirishda qo‘shgan hissasi uchun hamda bir qator taqsinga sazovor amalga oshirgan ishlarini inobatga olinib Uragnch RANCH texnologiya Universitetining faxriy professori unvoni berildi.

fields.desc_en:
In it, Professor DADA Adeboye of the University of Northamton, England, was awarded the title of honorary professor at the Uragnch RANCH University of technology, in recognition of his contribution to the development of the Urgench RANCH University of technology and the strengthening of bilateral friendship ties, as well as a number of recognized achievements. 

DADA Adeboye, an honorary professor at Urgench RANCH University of Technology, recognized that the university has created an environment suitable for international templates and stated that she is always ready to work cooperatively, to contribute to the recognition of the University's prestige to the world.

Bugun mehmonimiz Professor DADA Adeboye qadimiy Xivaga tashrif buyurdi. Xivada qadimiy obidalar bilan tanishib ulkan tarixiy merosga ega vatanimiz to‘g‘risida Northampton universitetida alohida taqdimot o‘tkazishini va bu yerga talabalar almashinuv doirasida Northampton universiteti talabalari hamda professor-o‘qituvchilarni jalb qilishini bildirdi. 

Professor DADA Adeboyening yurtimizga tashrifi davom etmoqda.

fields.desc_en:
Today, Our Guest Professor DADA Adeboye visited the ancient Khiva. Khiva has presented a special presentation at the University of Northampton about our homeland with a huge historical heritage, familiarizing itself with ancient monuments and attracting students and professors from the University of Northampton as part of a student exchange here. 

Professor DADA Adeboye's visit to our country continues.

fields.title: üè¢ Urganch Ranch texnologiya universitetida Angliyaning Northampton universiteti bilan hamkorlikda o‚Äòtkazilgan haftalik o'z yakuniga yetdi.

fields.title_en: üè¢ The weekend at Urgench Ranch University of technology in partnership with the University of Northampton, England ended.
fields.desc:
Hamkorlikda amalga oshirilgan ishlar sarhisob qilinib kelgusida amalga oshiriladigan vazifalar ikki tomonlama muhokama qilindi. Xususan Professor DADA Adeboyaning xalqaro miqyosdagi ish tajribasi, hamkorlikda bir qator dasturlarni amalga oshirish belgilanganligini inobatga olgan xolda Urganch Ranch texnologiya universiteti rektorining xalqaro masalalar bo'yicha maslahatchisi lavozimiga tayinlandi va ikki tomonlama shartnoma imzolandi.

Hurmatli Professorimiz DADA Adeboye boshchiligida xalqaro masalalar jumladan dunyoning eng nufuzli oliygohlari bilan hamkorlik yolga qo'yilishiga ishonamiz va faoliyatlarida ulkan zafarlar tilab qolamiz.
fields.desc_uz:
Hamkorlikda amalga oshirilgan ishlar sarhisob qilinib kelgusida amalga oshiriladigan vazifalar ikki tomonlama muhokama qilindi. Xususan Professor DADA Adeboyaning xalqaro miqyosdagi ish tajribasi, hamkorlikda bir qator dasturlarni amalga oshirish belgilanganligini inobatga olgan xolda Urganch Ranch texnologiya universiteti rektorining xalqaro masalalar bo'yicha maslahatchisi lavozimiga tayinlandi va ikki tomonlama shartnoma imzolandi.

Hurmatli Professorimiz DADA Adeboye boshchiligida xalqaro masalalar jumladan dunyoning eng nufuzli oliygohlari bilan hamkorlik yolga qo'yilishiga ishonamiz va faoliyatlarida ulkan zafarlar tilab qolamiz.
fields.desc_en:
The work carried out in cooperation was summed up and the tasks to be carried out in the future were discussed in two ways. In particular, Professor DADA Adeboya's work experience at the international level, taking into account the fact that the implementation of a number of programs in cooperation is established, kholda Urganch was appointed to the position of advisor to the rector of The Ranch University of technology on international affairs and a bilateral agreement was signed.

Under the leadership of our esteemed professor DADA Adeboye, we believe that international issues, including cooperation with the world's most prestigious universities, will be put on the road and wish tremendous victories in their activities.

fields.title_en: Today at Urgench RANCH University of technology, the literary and educational night "I will remain in your heart", dedicated to the 75th anniversary of the birth of the poet and translator Matnazar Abdulhakim, was held.
fields.desc:
Kechani Universiteti rektor maslahatchisi A.Matyoqubov ochib berdi. Tadbirda O'zbekiston yozuvchilar uyushmasi Xorazm viloyat bo'limi boshlig'i, shoira G.Ibodullayeva, O'zbekiston yozuvchilar uyushmasi a'zosi, yozuvchi Sh.Matkarimov va O'zbekiston yozuvchilar uyushmasi Xorazm viloyat bo'limi yetakchi mutaxassisi, ijodkor Shoira Shams so'zga chiqib, M.Abdulhakim ijodi, insoniy xislatlari va ustoz sifatidagi xizmatlari haqida gapirib o'tdilar. Kecha davomida Filologiya fakulteti talabalari tomonidan shoir she'rlari o'qib eshittirildi, g'azallari qo'shiq qilib kuylandi.

Mehmon ijodkorlar universitet kutubxonasiga M.Abdulhakim va o'zlarining kitoblaridan sovg'a qildilar. Universitet rektori maslahatchisi mehmonlari universitetning esdalik sovg'alarini topshirdi.

Tadbirda O'zbekiston yozuvchilar uyushmasi Xorazm viloyat bo'limi boshlig'i, shoira G.Ibodullayeva, O'zbekiston yozuvchilar uyushmasi a'zosi, yozuvchi Sh.Matkarimov va O'zbekiston yozuvchilar uyushmasi Xorazm viloyat bo'limi yetakchi mutaxassisi, ijodkor Shoira Shams so'zga chiqib, M.Abdulhakim ijodi, insoniy xislatlari va ustoz sifatidagi xizmatlari haqida gapirib o'tdilar. Kecha davomida Filologiya fakulteti talabalari tomonidan shoir she'rlari o'qib eshittirildi, g'azallari qo'shiq qilib kuylandi.

Mehmon ijodkorlar universitet kutubxonasiga M.Abdulhakim va o'zlarining kitoblaridan sovg'a qildilar. Universitet rektori maslahatchisi mehmonlari universitetning esdalik sovg'alarini topshirdi.
fields.desc_en:
Rector advisor of the University of the night A.Matyokubov revealed. The event was attended by the head of the Khorezm Regional Department of the Union of writers of Uzbekistan, poet G.Ibadullayeva, member of the Union of writers of Uzbekistan, writer Sh.Matkarimov and the leading specialist of the Khorezm regional branch of the Union of writers of Uzbekistan, the creative poet Shams spoke, M.Abdulhakim spoke about his creativity, human qualities and services as a teacher. During the night, poet poems were read and broadcast by students of the Philological faculty, ghazals were sung.

Guest artists attended the university library as M.Abdulhakim and made a gift from their books. Guests of the adviser to the rector of the University handed over souvenirs of the University.

fields.desc:
üè¢  Shartnomani O'zbekiston Savdo-sanoat palatasi Xorazm viloyati hududiy boshqarmasi boshlig'i Q.Q.Igambergenov va Urganch Ranch texnologiya universiteti rektori v.v.b. D.I.Ruzmetov imzoladilar.

Shartnomada:
üî∏Boshqarma tomonidan tadbirkorlarni UTU Ranch hamda xalqaro universitetlar tomonidan ajratiladigan loyihalarida qatnashishlari uchun targ'ibot tadbirlarini olib borish, tadbirkorlar ishtirokini ta'minlash va munosiblarini tanlashda ko'maklashish.
üî∏UTU Ranchda o'qiyotgan va o'qishni tugatgan talabalarni ustoz shogird uslubida tadbirkorlarga berkitgan holda faoliyatini boshlashlarida ko'maklashish.
üî∏UTU Ranch talabalari malakaviy amaliyotini o'tash uchun korxona tashkilotlarga chiqishda amaliy ko'maklashish.
üî∏Boshqarma va UTU Ranch birgalikda tadbirkorlar uchun tadbirkorlik faoliyatiga bo'g'liq kurslarini tashkil etish va boshqa bir qator yo'nalishlarda hamkorlik qilish yuzasidan kelishib olindi.

üè¢ Head of the territorial Department of the Khorezm region of the Chamber of Commerce and industry of Uzbekistan Q.Q.Igambergenov and Rector of Urgench Ranch University of technology V.v.b. D.I.Ruzmetov signed.

In the contract:
üî∏To conduct promotional activities, ensure the participation of entrepreneurs and promote the selection of worthy ones so that entrepreneurs can participate in their projects allocated by UTU Ranch and international universities.
üî∏Assist students studying and completing their studies at UTU Ranch to start their activities while concealing them to entrepreneurs in the style of Master Apprentice.
üî∏UTU Ranch students practical assistance in getting out of enterprise organizations to undergo qualification practice.
üî∏The department and UTU Ranch jointly agreed on the organization of joint courses on entrepreneurial activity for entrepreneurs and cooperation in a number of other areas.

‚úçÔ∏è  Memorandumni IDP IELTS ning O‘zbekistondagi rasmiy vakili, Edu-Action MCHJ direktori A. Akhrorkhodjaev va Urganch Ranch texnologiya universiteti rektori v.v.b. D.I.Ruzmetov imzoladilar.

üìù  Memorandumda IELTS imtixonlarini UTU RANChda tashkillashtirish va o’tkazish, shu jumladan IELTES imtixonlariga tayyorgarlik ko'rish va o'tkazish bo’yicha masterklass va vebinarlar tashkil qilish;
UTU RANCHda IELTS intixonlariga tayyorlash maqsadida maxsus o'quv kurslarini tashkil qilish;
Universitetda IELTS imtihonlarini onlayn (SD-IELTS) va oflayn (paper-based) formatda, bundan tashqari TKT va Linguaskill imtihonlarini hamkorlikda olib borish xamda boshqa bir qator yo'nalishlarda hamkorlik qilish yuzasidan kelishib olindi.

üìù In the memorandum, the organization and transfer of IELTS imtixos at UTU Ranch, including the organization of masterclass and webinars in preparation and transfer of ieltes imtixos;

fields.title_en: On September 23, 2023, a seminar meeting was held with professors and teachers of "Urganch Ranch University of Technology".
fields.desc:
Unda O‘zbekiston Respublikasi Prezidenti Shavkat Mirziyoevning BMT Bosh Assambleyasining 78-sessiyasida so‘zlagan nutqida ko’tarilgan masalalarning mazmun-mohiyati muhokama etildi, hamda uni talabalarga yetkazishda e’tibor berilishi lozim bo’lgan muhim jihatlar yuzasidan ma’lumotlar berildi.

Kun tartibidagi ikkinchi masala yuzasidan Rektor maslahatchisi A.Matyakubov so’zga chiqib, Universitetda ma’naviy-ma’rifiy ishlarni tizimli rejalashtirish bo’yicha tushuntirishlar o’tkazdi va ko’rsatmalar berdi. Xususan, talabalar bilan o’tkaziladigan ma’naviy-ma’rifiy tadbirlarni o’tkazishda talaba yoshlarning qiziqishlarini hisobga olish, Internet va ijtimoiy tarmoqlardan maqsadli foydalanish, universitet kafedralari qoshida fan va ijodiy to’garaklar faoliyati samaradorligini oshirish kabi masalalar yuzasidan fikrlarini bildirdi

Shundan so’ng, professor-o’qituvchilar uchun psixologik treninglar tashkil etildi.

Universitet psixologi M.Niyozmetova tomonidan professor-o’qituvchilarning xarakter temperamentlarini o’rganish, ish jarayonida yuzaga kelishi mumkin bo’lgan stresslarni yengib o’tish yo’llari bo’yicha treninglar o’tkazildi. Jumladan, “Psixogeometrik test”, “Baland tog’lar” kabi treninglar o’qituvchilar tomonidan katta qiziqish bilan qabul qilindi.
fields.desc_uz:

fields.desc_en:
It discussed the essence of the issues raised in the speech of the President of the Republic of Uzbekistan Shavkat Mirziyoyev at the 78th session of the UN General Assembly, and provided information on the important aspects that should be paid attention to when conveying it to students.

Regarding the second issue on the agenda, Rector's adviser A. Matyakubov spoke and explained and gave instructions on the systematic planning of spiritual and educational work at the University. In particular, during the spiritual and educational events held with students, the student expressed his views on issues such as taking into account the interests of young people, purposeful use of the Internet and social networks, increasing the effectiveness of science and creative circles under university departments.

After that, psychological trainings were organized for professors and teachers.

University psychologist M. Niyozmetova conducted trainings on studying character temperaments of professors and on ways to overcome stress that may arise in the work process. In particular, trainings such as "Psychogeometric test", "High mountains" were received by teachers with great interest.

Tadbirda O. Egamberganov, universitetning Yoshlar masalalari va ma’naviy-ma’rifiy ishlar bo‘yicha 1-prorektori A.Xudaybergenov, rektor maslahatchisi A.Matyakubovlar ma’ruza qilib, talaba yoshlarga mavzu bo‘yicha zarur tushunchalar berib ogoh bo‘lishga chaqirdilar. 

Tadbir davomida talabalariga “Ayol qismati” deb nomlangan diniy ekstremistik va terrorchi guruhlarga aldanib qo‘shilgan O‘zbekiston fuqarolari va ularning ayrimlarini “MEHR” operatsiyasi tadbilari doirasida vatanga qaytarib olib kelinib reabilitatsiya qilinganliklari aks ettirilgan film namoyish etildi.

Tadbir davomida talabalariga “Ayol qismati” deb nomlangan diniy ekstremistik va terrorchi guruhlarga aldanib qo‘shilgan O‘zbekiston fuqarolari va ularning ayrimlarini “MEHR” operatsiyasi tadbilari doirasida vatanga qaytarib olib kelinib reabilitatsiya qilinganliklari aks ettirilgan film namoyish etildi.
fields.desc_en:
At The Event, O. Egamberganov, 1st vice-rector of the University for youth issues and spiritual and Educational Affairs A.Khudaybergenov, rector advisor A.The matyakubovs gave a lecture and called on the student to be alert, giving the young people the necessary concepts on the topic.

During the event, a film was shown in which students were brought back to their homeland and rehabilitated as part of operation MEHR activities by citizens of Uzbekistan and some of them who were deceived into religious extremist and terrorist groups called “Women's partition”.

fields.title_en: Students of the Uzbek language group 2302 took part in the event "A mirror to our heart and soul - language" held in the regional library named after Mahmud az-Zamakhshari.
fields.desc:
Tadbirda shoir, Yozuvchilar uyushmasi a'zolari Ro'ziboy Qulmat, Xudoybergan Shomurodov, Urganch RANCH texnologiya universiteti o'qituvchisi Laylo Hayitovalar so'zga chiqib barchani til bayrami bilan qutlashdi va ona tilimizga e'tiborli bo'lish haqida atroflicha so'z yuritdilar. 
üìïTadbirning badiiy qismida O'zbekiston xalq baxshisi Yetmishboy Sobirov ijrosida dostonlar,  O'zbekiston davlat xoreografiya akademiyasi Urganch filiali bo'lim boshlig'i Ozodbek Soipovlar ijrosida qo'shiqlar tinglandi, RANCH texnologiya universiteti talabalari tomonidan ona tilimizga bag'ishlangan she'rlar aytildi.
fields.desc_uz:
Tadbirda shoir, Yozuvchilar uyushmasi a'zolari Ro'ziboy Qulmat, Xudoybergan Shomurodov, Urganch RANCH texnologiya universiteti o'qituvchisi Laylo Hayitovalar so'zga chiqib barchani til bayrami bilan qutlashdi va ona tilimizga e'tiborli bo'lish haqida atroflicha so'z yuritdilar. 
üìïTadbirning badiiy qismida O'zbekiston xalq baxshisi Yetmishboy Sobirov ijrosida dostonlar,  O'zbekiston davlat xoreografiya akademiyasi Urganch filiali bo'lim boshlig'i Ozodbek Soipovlar ijrosida qo'shiqlar tinglandi, RANCH texnologiya universiteti talabalari tomonidan ona tilimizga bag'ishlangan she'rlar aytildi.
fields.desc_en:
At the event, poet, members of Writers' Union Roziboy Kulmat, Khudoibergan Shomurodov, teacher of Urganch RANCH University of Technology Layla Hayitova spoke and congratulated everyone with a language holiday and talked about paying attention to our mother tongue.
üìïIn the artistic part of the event, epics were performed by Yetmishboy Sobirov, the national poet of Uzbekistan, songs were performed by Ozodbek Saipovlar, head of the department of the Urganch branch of the State Choreography Academy of Uzbekistan, and poems dedicated to our mother tongue were recited by the students of RANCH University of Technology. .

fields.title: Chexiyaning Ceske Budejovice shahridagi Times Higher Education oliy ta'limdagi yangiliklar va boshqa masalalarga...
fields.title_uz: Chexiyaning Ceske Budejovice shahridagi Times Higher Education oliy ta'limdagi yangiliklar va boshqa masalalarga...
fields.title_en: Times Higher Education in Ceske Budejovice, Czech Republic covers news and other issues in higher education...
fields.desc:
üìçChexiyaning Ceske Budejovice shahridagi Times Higher Education oliy ta'limdagi yangiliklar va boshqa masalalarga ixtisoslashgan xalqaro reyting agentligining tadqiqot natijalariga ko’ra top 1000 talikga va eng yosh taraqqiy etuvchi universitetlar qatorida 300 talikga kiritilgan Chexiyaning Janubiy Bogemiya universiteti bilan hamkorlik memorandumi imzolandi. 

Memorandumda:

1.  Professor o'qituvchilar va ma'muriy xodimlar almashinuvi;
2.  Birgalikda tashkil etilgan kurslarni o'tkazish uchun fakultet almashinuvi;
3.   Ilmiy amaliyot va malaka oshirish uchun magistratura va bakalavriat bosqichlarida talabalar almashinuvi;
4.  Ilmiy uchrashuvlar va simpoziumlar tashkil etish; 
5. Mutaxassislar va talabalarni jalb etgan holda ilmiy va yozgi maktablarda hamkorlikda ishtirok etish va o‘tkazish;
Kabi muhim masalalarda hamkorlik qilishga kelishib olindi.

üóìÔ∏è Universitetimiz delegatsiyasining Yevropa bo'ylab tashifi davom etmoqda.

üóìÔ∏è Universitetimiz delegatsiyasining Yevropa bo'ylab tashifi davom etmoqda.
fields.desc_en:
üìçA memorandum of cooperation was signed with the Czech University of South Bohemia, which is among the top 1000 and among the 300 of the youngest progressive universities according to the results of the research of Times Higher Education, an international rating agency specializing in news and other issues in higher education in Ceske Budejovice, Czech Republic.

In the memorandum:

1. Exchange of professors and administrative staff;
2. Exchange of faculty to conduct jointly organized courses;
3. Exchange of students at the master's and bachelor's levels for scientific practice and professional development;
4. Organization of scientific meetings and symposia;
5. Participation and holding of scientific and summer schools in cooperation with the involvement of experts and students;
It was agreed to cooperate on such important issues.

üóìÔ∏è The visit of the delegation of our university to Europe continues.

Bugun 20 -oktabr kuni Urganch Ranch texnologiya universiteti psixologi  Niyazmetova Munira Ibragimovna va universitet tyutorlari hamkorligida fakultetning 1-bosqich talabalari bilan "Men va men tanlagan kasb" mavzusida psixologik trening o'tkazildi. 

Trening davomida talabalarga tanlagan kasbi yuzasidan doimo yangilikga intilish, bo'sh  vaqtida ilmiy adabiyotlarni o'qish va o'z ustida ishlashi bo ªyicha zarur tavsiyalar berildi.

Today, on October 20, psychologist Niyazmetova Munira Ibragimovna of Urganch Ranch University of Technology and university tutors conducted a psychological training on the topic "Me and my chosen profession" with students of the 1st stage of the faculty.

During the training, the students were given the necessary recommendations to always strive for innovation in their chosen profession, to read scientific literature in their spare time and to work on themselves.

Also, during the training, psychological tests and games were organized to increase self-confidence of young people.

fields.desc_en:
On April 13, 2023, the Minister of Higher Education, Science and Innovation Ibrahim Abdurahmanov met with the Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of Italy to Uzbekistan Agostino Pinna.

üìå During the meeting, issues of strengthening relations between Uzbekistan and Italy in the field of education and science were discussed. In particular, opinions were exchanged on establishing direct cooperation between the universities of the two countries, holding online and offline meetings, master classes, and trainings in cooperation with higher education institutions.
On May 23, 2023, rectors of a number of higher educational institutions of Uzbekistan visited Turin Polytechnic University in Tashkent in order to develop cooperation relations with Turin Polytechnic University of Italy.

üìå As a result of the negotiations, a tripartite agreement on the development of cooperation was signed.

fields.title_en: üèõÔ∏è On October 27, 2023, professors of St. Petersburg State University visited Urganch Ranch University of Technology ....
fields.desc:
üèõÔ∏è 2023 yil 27 oktyabr kuni Urganch Ranch texnologiya universitetiga Sankt-Peterburg davlat universiteti professorlari Deryugin Pavel Petrovich, Lebedintseva Lyubov' Aleksandrovna hamda Urganch davlat universiteti “Mintaqaviy laboratoriya” mudiri, Barqaror rivojlanish markazi Xorazm viloyat bo'linmasi rahbari iqtisod fanlari doktori, professor Baxtiyor Ro'zmetov tashrif buyurdilar.

üìå Mehmonlar universitet professor-o'qituvchilar bilan suhbat o'tkazdilar, iqtisodiy sotsiologik tadqiqotlarning zamonaviy yo'nalishlari, iqtisodiy faoliyatni etnik va ijtimoiy mohiyati masalalari to'g'risida fikr almashdilar. 
Kelgusida amalga oshirilishi rejalashtirilayotgan akademik va ilmiy hamko’rlik masalalari bo'yicha takliflar ilgari surildi.
fields.desc_uz:
üèõÔ∏è 2023 yil 27 oktyabr kuni Urganch Ranch texnologiya universitetiga Sankt-Peterburg davlat universiteti professorlari Deryugin Pavel Petrovich, Lebedintseva Lyubov' Aleksandrovna hamda Urganch davlat universiteti “Mintaqaviy laboratoriya” mudiri, Barqaror rivojlanish markazi Xorazm viloyat bo'linmasi rahbari iqtisod fanlari doktori, professor Baxtiyor Ro'zmetov tashrif buyurdilar.

üìå Mehmonlar universitet professor-o'qituvchilar bilan suhbat o'tkazdilar, iqtisodiy sotsiologik tadqiqotlarning zamonaviy yo'nalishlari, iqtisodiy faoliyatni etnik va ijtimoiy mohiyati masalalari to'g'risida fikr almashdilar. 
Kelgusida amalga oshirilishi rejalashtirilayotgan akademik va ilmiy hamko’rlik masalalari bo'yicha takliflar ilgari surildi.
fields.desc_en:
üèõÔ∏è On October 27, 2023, professors of St. Petersburg State University, Deryugin Pavel Petrovich, Lebedintseva Lyubov Alexandrovna, and head of the "Regional Laboratory" of Urganch State University, head of the Khorezm regional branch of the Center for Sustainable Development, doctor of economics, professor Bakhtiyor Ro, visited the Urganch Ranch University of Technology on October 27, 2023. zmetov visited.

üìå The guests had a conversation with the professors and teachers of the university, exchanged opinions on the modern directions of economic sociological research, issues of ethnic and social nature of economic activity.
Proposals were put forward on issues of academic and scientific cooperation that are planned to be implemented in the future.

fields.title: üèõÔ∏è 2023 yil 28-oktyabr kuni Urganch Ranch texnologiya universitetida ‚ÄúOchiq eshiklar kuni‚Äù tashkil etildi.
fields.title_uz: üèõÔ∏è 2023 yil 28-oktyabr kuni Urganch Ranch texnologiya universitetida ‚ÄúOchiq eshiklar kuni‚Äù tashkil etildi.
fields.title_en: üèõÔ∏è On October 28, 2023, "Open Day" was organized at Urganch Ranch University of Technology.
fields.desc:
Tadbir doirasida universitetga tashrif buyurgan ota-onalar bilan muloqot uchrashuvi tashkil etilib, unda universitetda talabalarning ta'lim olishlari, dam olishlari, ijodiy, fan va sport to‘garaklarida qatnashishlari uchun yaratilayotgan sharoitlar to‘g‘risida ma'lumotlar taqdim etildi.

üî∏ Shuningdek, ota-onalar tomonidan bildirilgan fikrlar va mulohazalar tinglanib, ularni qiziqtiradigan savollarga javoblar berildi, kelajakda amalga oshiriladigan rejalar bayon etildi.
Shundan so‘ng ota-onalar universitet auditoriyalari, laboratoriya xonalari bilan tanishdilar, universitet oshxonasida ular uchun kofe-breyk tashkil etildi.

üî∏ Tadbir yakunida ota-onalar tomonidan Universitet rahbariyatiga minnatdorchiliklar bildirilib, to‘g‘ri tanlov qilganliklariga yana bir bor ishonch hosil qilganliklarini e'tirof etdilar.
Hamkorlik – taraqqiyot garovi!

‚úÖ Ranch – imkoniyatlar universiteti!
fields.desc_uz:
Tadbir doirasida universitetga tashrif buyurgan ota-onalar bilan muloqot uchrashuvi tashkil etilib, unda universitetda talabalarning ta'lim olishlari, dam olishlari, ijodiy, fan va sport to‘garaklarida qatnashishlari uchun yaratilayotgan sharoitlar to‘g‘risida ma'lumotlar taqdim etildi.

üî∏ Shuningdek, ota-onalar tomonidan bildirilgan fikrlar va mulohazalar tinglanib, ularni qiziqtiradigan savollarga javoblar berildi, kelajakda amalga oshiriladigan rejalar bayon etildi.
Shundan so‘ng ota-onalar universitet auditoriyalari, laboratoriya xonalari bilan tanishdilar, universitet oshxonasida ular uchun kofe-breyk tashkil etildi.

üî∏ Tadbir yakunida ota-onalar tomonidan Universitet rahbariyatiga minnatdorchiliklar bildirilib, to‘g‘ri tanlov qilganliklariga yana bir bor ishonch hosil qilganliklarini e'tirof etdilar.
Hamkorlik – taraqqiyot garovi!

‚úÖ Ranch – imkoniyatlar universiteti!
fields.desc_en:
As part of the event, a communication meeting was organized with parents who visited the university, where information was provided about the conditions created for students to study, have fun, participate in creative, scientific and sports circles at the university.

üî∏ Also, opinions and comments expressed by parents were listened to, questions of interest to them were answered, future plans were explained.
After that, the parents got acquainted with the university auditoriums and laboratory rooms, and a coffee break was organized for them in the university kitchen.

üî∏ At the end of the event, the parents expressed their gratitude to the University management and acknowledged that they were once again convinced that they had made the right choice.
Cooperation is the guarantee of development!

‚úÖ Ranch is a university of opportunities!

fields.desc_en:
üèõÔ∏è Museums are cultural and educational institutions, they provide a lot of knowledge about the development of the nation in the process of historical development, cultural and spiritual heritage, especially satisfying the aesthetic needs of young people is one of the leading means of bringing them to spiritual maturity.

More than 130 students of Urganch Ranch University of Technology visited the "Picture Gallery" located in Urganch from November 6 to November 9 under the guidance of "Vice Rector for Youth Affairs and Spiritual Education" O. Khudoyberganov and tutors.
Here they got to know the history of the museum, the examples of fine art, graphics and sculpture.
The director of the museum, Tashova Shirin Abdirapikovna, gave the students interesting information about the ideological and aesthetic nature of famous artists of Uzbekistan and their works.
 
üìå Cooperation between Urganch Ranch University of Technology and Urganch Art Gallery will continue from now on

fields.desc_en:
Read Pride and Prejudice (by Jane Austen) by December 18, 2023 and win a variety of prizes!

Our competition will be held on December 19, 2023 in rooms 413 and 418. Questions are answered in writing. The questions in the contest include several tasks: finding the explanation of words, filling in the place of the dots with the necessary words, answering the questions, placing the replaced words in the sentences in the correct order, choosing the appropriate one from the given answers, etc.

ü•≥ Prizes will be awarded to our students who won the first, second and third places!

fields.title_en: üîî In connection with the holiday "November 17 - International Students' Day" among the students of Urganch Ranch University of Technology, the slogan "My student-golden age"...
fields.desc:
üîî “17-noyabr - Xalqaro talabalar kuni” bayrami munosabati bilan Urganch Ranch texnologiya universiteti talabalari o‘rtasida  “Talabalik-oltin davrim” shiori ostida bellashuv o’tkazildi. 
Bellashuv 4 ta shart asosida olib borildi. Har bir shart o‘zida talabalikning oltin davri, uning yoshlar hayoti va kelajagi borasidagi ahamiyati, hayotiy vaziyatlar, muammoli holatlar va ularning yechimiga qaratildi, talabalarning salohiyatini yaxshilashga oid g‘oyalar chiroyli sahna ko’rinishlari orqali namoyish etildi. 

Bellashuv natijalariga ko’ra 1-o’ringa “Maktabgacha ta’lim psixologiyasi va pedagogikasi”, 2-o’ringa “Iqtisodiyot” hamda “O’zga tilli guruhlarda rus tili”, 3-o’ringa “Kompyuter injiniringi” ta’lim yo’nalishi talabalari sazovor bo’ldilar.
Tadbir ehtiros va yumorlarga boy tarzda bo’ib o’tdi.

fields.desc_en:
üîî In connection with the holiday "November 17 - International Student Day", a competition was held among the students of Urganch Ranch University of Technology under the slogan "My student-golden age".
The competition was conducted on the basis of 4 conditions. Each condition focused on the golden age of studentship, its importance for the life and future of young people, life situations, problematic situations and their solutions, and ideas for improving the potential of students were presented through beautiful stage performances.

According to the results of the competition, "Psychology and pedagogy of preschool education" won 1st place, "Economics" won 2nd place and "Russian language in foreign language groups", "Computer engineering" won 3rd place. lim students were awarded.
The event was full of passion and humor.
